MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G51 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:35pm following reports of safety concern on our underground cable network on Arklet Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:10pm on the 15th of January 2021.
